rows.label: tlk44400085_01_msg0001
rows.name:
You've come from the outside,
haven't you? Allow me to teach
you about our city.

rows.label: tlk44400085_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You see the tower-like structure in the
center of Elmos Square? The Divine
Beast's ether flows through that.

rows.label: tlk44400085_01_msg0003
rows.name:
We use the energy to heat our
water, which is circulated throughout
the kingdom.

rows.label: tlk44400085_01_msg0004
rows.name:
So even if there's a frightful blizzard
outside, we get to stay lovely and
toasty. Insightful, no?
